Plot: On a road trip, Nic and two friends are drawn to an isolated area by a computer genius. When everything suddenly goes dark, Nic regains consciousness - only to find himself in a waking nightmare.
Title: The Signal
Writer: Carlyle Eubank, William Eubank, David Frigerio
Actors: Patrick Davidson, Brenton Thwaites, Olivia Cooke, Beau Knapp
tomatoConsensus: Director William Eubank clearly has big ideas and an impressive level of technical expertise; unfortunately, The Signal fritters them away on a poorly constructed story.
